metadata.title: CVE-2024-35924 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:typec: ucsi: Limit read size on v1.2 Between UCSI 1.2 and UCSI 2.0, thesize of the MESSAGE_IN region was increased from 16 to 256. In order toavoid overflowing reads for older systems, add a mechanism to use the readUCSI version to truncate read sizes on UCSI v1.2.
